    # File lib/capistrano/application.rb, line 3
def initialize
  super
  @rakefiles = %w{capfile Capfile capfile.rb Capfile.rb} << capfile
end

    display_error_message(ex) click to toggle source
    Calls superclass method 
    # File lib/capistrano/application.rb, line 62
def display_error_message(ex)
  unless options.backtrace
    Rake.application.options.suppress_backtrace_pattern = backtrace_pattern if backtrace_pattern
    trace "(Backtrace restricted to imported tasks)"
  end

  super
end
    exit_because_of_exception(ex) click to toggle source
    Calls superclass method 
    # File lib/capistrano/application.rb, line 71
def exit_because_of_exception(ex)
  if respond_to?(:deploying?) && deploying?
    exit_deploy_because_of_exception(ex)
  else
    super
  end
end
    handle_options() click to toggle source 
    # File lib/capistrano/application.rb, line 26
def handle_options
  options.rakelib = ["rakelib"]
  options.trace_output = $stderr

  OptionParser.new do |opts|
    opts.banner = "See full documentation at http://capistranorb.com/."
    opts.separator ""
    opts.separator "Install capistrano in a project:"
    opts.separator "    bundle exec cap install [STAGES=qa,staging,production,...]"
    opts.separator ""
    opts.separator "Show available tasks:"
    opts.separator "    bundle exec cap -T"
    opts.separator ""
    opts.separator "Invoke (or simulate invoking) a task:"
    opts.separator "    bundle exec cap [--dry-run] STAGE TASK"
    opts.separator ""
    opts.separator "Advanced options:"

    opts.on_tail("-h", "--help", "-H", "Display this help message.") do
      puts opts
      exit
    end

    standard_rake_options.each { |args| opts.on(*args) }
    opts.environment("RAKEOPT")
  end.parse!
end

  "cap"

    sort_options(options) click to toggle source
    Calls superclass method 
    # File lib/capistrano/application.rb, line 17
def sort_options(options)
  not_applicable_to_capistrano = %w(quiet silent verbose)
  options.reject! do |(switch, *)|
    switch =~ /--#{Regexp.union(not_applicable_to_capistrano)}/
  end

  super.push(version, dry_run, roles, hostfilter, print_config_variables)
end
    top_level_tasks() click to toggle source 
    # File lib/capistrano/application.rb, line 54
def top_level_tasks
  if tasks_without_stage_dependency.include?(@top_level_tasks.first)
    @top_level_tasks
  else
    @top_level_tasks.unshift(ensure_stage.to_s)
  end
end

    Private Instance Methods

    backtrace_pattern() click to toggle source 
    # File lib/capistrano/application.rb, line 81
def backtrace_pattern
  loc = Rake.application.find_rakefile_location
  return unless loc

  whitelist = (@imported.dup << loc[0]).map { |f| File.absolute_path(f, loc[1]) }
  /^(?!#{whitelist.map { |p| Regexp.quote(p) }.join('|')})/
end
    capfile() click to toggle source

    allows the `cap install` task to load without a capfile

    # File lib/capistrano/application.rb, line 100
def capfile
  File.expand_path(File.join(File.dirname(__FILE__), "..", "Capfile"))
end
    dry_run() click to toggle source 
    # File lib/capistrano/application.rb, line 113
def dry_run
  ["--dry-run", "-n",
   "Do a dry run without executing actions",
   lambda do |_value|
     Configuration.env.set(:sshkit_backend, SSHKit::Backend::Printer)
   end]
end
    hostfilter() click to toggle source 
    # File lib/capistrano/application.rb, line 129
def hostfilter
  ["--hosts HOSTS", "-z",
   "Run SSH commands only on matching hosts",
   lambda do |value|
     Configuration.env.add_cmdline_filter(:host, value)
   end]
end
    load_imports() click to toggle source
    Calls superclass method 
    # File lib/capistrano/application.rb, line 89
def load_imports
  if options.show_tasks
    invoke "load:defaults"
    set(:stage, "")
    Dir[deploy_config_path].each { |f| add_import f }
  end

  super
end
    print_config_variables() click to toggle source 
    # File lib/capistrano/application.rb, line 137
def print_config_variables
  ["--print-config-variables", "-p",
   "Display the defined config variables before starting the deployment tasks.",
   lambda do |_value|
     Configuration.env.set(:print_config_variables, true)
   end]
end
    roles() click to toggle source 
    # File lib/capistrano/application.rb, line 121
def roles
  ["--roles ROLES", "-r",
   "Run SSH commands only on hosts matching these roles",
   lambda do |value|
     Configuration.env.add_cmdline_filter(:role, value)
   end]
end
    version() click to toggle source 
    # File lib/capistrano/application.rb, line 104
def version
  ["--version", "-V",
   "Display the program version.",
   lambda do |_value|
     puts "Capistrano Version: #{Capistrano::VERSION} (Rake Version: #{Rake::VERSION})"
     exit
   end]
end
